meanings.definition: A store where candy and other sweets are sold.
meanings.sent1: I visited the sweetshop to buy some delicious candies.
meanings.sent2: The sweetshop on the corner always has a wide variety of treats.
meanings.sent3: The sweetshop owner dressed up as a candy cane for Halloween!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as the candies in the sweetshop.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked cookies filled the sweetshop.

meanings.definition: The act of running a store that sells candy and other sweets.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys the daily tasks involved in managing a sweetshop.
meanings.sent2: Running a successful sweetshop requires good business skills.
meanings.sent3: The sweetshop owner juggled lollipops to entertain the customers.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his sweetshop was as strong as a candy cane.
meanings.sent5: The sweetshop buzzed with activity during the holiday season.
